thread.title: Blockchain Talent Wars Escalate, Hindering Product Development

author: Yuliya Chernova
title: Blockchain Talent Wars Escalate, Hindering Product Development
text:
David Schwartz, the chief cryptographer at blockchain startup Ripple Inc., recently saw a developer on his team receive not one, but two, $1 million signing bonus offers.
He said one offer was from a cryptocurrency startup, the other from a large technology company with a blockchain initiative.
Pay packages for cryptocurrency talent â€œhave...
